item.title: Ola Krutrim Launches AI Cloud Platform and Mobile App
item.dc:creator: ross
item.description: Indian-made artificial intelligence (AI) platform Ola Krutrim has introduced its cutting-edge AI Cloud infrastructure, called Krutrim Cloud. It has also launched the Krutrim Assistant mobile app, unveiling its ambitious vision for fostering innovation and accessibility in India’s AI sector. This initiative signals a shift in India’s technological landscape, empowering developers and enterprises to harness the […]
item.content:encoded:
Indian-made artificial intelligence (AI) platform Ola Krutrim has introduced its cutting-edge AI Cloud infrastructure, called Krutrim Cloud. It has also launched the Krutrim Assistant mobile app, unveiling its ambitious vision for fostering innovation and accessibility in India’s AI sector. This initiative signals a shift in India’s technological landscape, empowering developers and enterprises to harness the […]

The post Ola Krutrim Launches AI Cloud Platform and Mobile App appeared first on Analytics Vidhya.

item.title: Get a Summary of Trending Topics on X with Grok-Powered Stories Feature
item.dc:creator: ross
item.description: X, the social media platform formerly known as Twitter, has introduced a new feature called Stories, powered by Elon Musk’s AI chatbot, Grok. Available exclusively for X’s premium subscribers, Stories aims to revolutionize news consumption by providing concise summaries of trending topics within the platform’s Explore section. Let’s delve into how this innovative feature works […]
item.content:encoded:
X, the social media platform formerly known as Twitter, has introduced a new feature called Stories, powered by Elon Musk’s AI chatbot, Grok. Available exclusively for X’s premium subscribers, Stories aims to revolutionize news consumption by providing concise summaries of trending topics within the platform’s Explore section. Let’s delve into how this innovative feature works […]

item.title: Is Sam Altman Crazy or a Genius? $50 Billion AGI Gamble Explained!
item.dc:creator: ross
item.description: In a series of candid discussions, Sam Altman, the CEO of OpenAI, has made bold statements about the future and financial commitment of his company towards achieving Artificial General Intelligence (AGI). item.title: Join the Exciting $100,000 AI Challenge by LMSYS and Kaggle!
item.dc:creator: ross
item.description: LMSYS and Kaggle have joined forces for an epic competition: predicting human preferences with machine learning! This competition aims to use machine learning to better understand how humans make choices, which can help improve AI technologies. Winners walk away with a cool $100,000. Are you up for the challenge? What is the AI Challenge by […]
item.content:encoded:

item.title: OpenAI Sora: World’s First Commissioned Music Video by AI
item.dc:creator: ross
item.description: OpenAI Sora is again in the limelight with its first commissioned Music Video. After the release of The Balloon Man in ‘Air Head’ – a short film made with Sora, Hollywood’s fascination with this text-to-video model soared to new heights. Today, OpenAI Sora has achieved a remarkable feat by creating the world’s first commissioned music […]

item.title: World’s First Autonomous Car Race Held at Abu Dhabi’s Yas Marina
item.dc:creator: ross
item.description: Can you imagine a car race without any drivers? Well, it’s no longer imagination, but a reality now! That’s right, the world witnessed the first-ever professional autonomous car race over the weekend. The Abu Dhabi Autonomous Racing League (A2RL) held at Yas Marina marked a significant leap in the motor racing world. With autonomous cars […]

item.title: Meet Victoria Shi, the World’s First AI-Generated Foreign Minister
item.dc:creator: ross
item.description: Ukraine has embarked on a pioneering venture by introducing the world’s first ‘AI diplomat’. The country has developed an artificial intelligence (AI) generated spokesperson to be the face and voice of their Ministry of Foreign Affairs. The AI, named Victoria Shi, has been launched to announce updates on various fronts, on behalf of the Ukrainian […]
item.content:encoded:
Ukraine has embarked on a pioneering venture by introducing the world’s first ‘AI diplomat’. The country has developed an artificial intelligence (AI) generated spokesperson to be the face and voice of their Ministry of Foreign Affairs. The AI, named Victoria Shi, has been launched to announce updates on various fronts, on behalf of the Ukrainian […]

item.title: Gemini Upgrade 2024: Focus on Boosting Power and Accessibility

item.title: AI on the Go: Anthropic Launches Claude Mobile App

item.title: Med-Gemini : A New AI Model Reaching 91.1% Accuracy in Medical Diagnostics
item.dc:creator: ross
item.description: Researchers from Google and DeepMind have introduced Med-Gemini, a new generation of AI models specifically tailored for medical applications. Building on the strengths of the 2023 Gemini models renowned for language processing, multimodal understanding, and long-context reasoning, Med-Gemini significantly enhances these capabilities for healthcare applications. Med-Gemini’s superiority is demonstrated through evaluation on 14 medical benchmarks, […]
item.content:encoded:
Researchers from Google and DeepMind have introduced Med-Gemini, a new generation of AI models specifically tailored for medical applications. Building on the strengths of the 2023 Gemini models renowned for language processing, multimodal understanding, and long-context reasoning, Med-Gemini significantly enhances these capabilities for healthcare applications. Med-Gemini’s superiority is demonstrated through evaluation on 14 medical benchmarks, […]

The post Med-Gemini : A New AI Model Reaching 91.1% Accuracy in Medical Diagnostics appeared first on Analytics Vidhya.
